star.situation: Legacy monolith causing slow delivery and fragile deployments across the AdTech platform.
star.task: Refactor and stabilize the system while maintaining continuous delivery for millions of ad impressions.
actions: Led a multi-year modernization effort, decomposing monolith into event-driven microservices.
Introduced Domain-Driven Design (DDD) and ubiquitous language to align tech and business teams.
Implemented AWS-based CI/CD pipelines, observability, and fault-tolerant architecture.
results: Improved release cycle time from weeks to days.
star.impact_summary: Transformed a fragile legacy advertising platform into a scalable, reliable, cloud-native architecture.

condensed_star_text: Led modernization of AdTech platform from monolith to event-driven microservices using DDD and AWS. Reduced incidents by 75%, improved release cadence from weeks to days. Increased reliability and team efficiency through domain-driven design and automation.
